formula: E.g.f.: -2 x - psi_2(1/x) / x^2, where psi_n(z) is the polygamma function, psi_n(z) = (d/dz)^{n+1} log(Gamma(z)). - _Vladimir Reshetnikov_, Apr 24 2013
